DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether ecabet ophthalmic solution is an effective treatment for dry eye syndrome
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety Study for Ecabet Ophthalmic Solution for Treating Dry Eye Syndrome
DOC.criteria: Male/female at least 18 years of age Agree to avoid disallowed medications Have a diagnosis of dry eye Have chronic systemic inflammation Have active seasonal ocular allergies
